tgt_original: aho aho śākyakulasya ketuḥ |  aho praṇamyaḥ sa narendrasūryo  yenedṛśaṃ bhāṣitasūtramuttamam || 3 ||
satāṃ varo yadvijahāra nityaṃ  dadāhi me darśanatoyaśītalam |
prahlādayainān karuṇājalena || 9 ||  kāruṇyabhāvaṃ kuru nātha nāyaka
sattvā hi śūnyā nahi jātu vidyate || 6 ||
nityaṃ ca nityaṃ ca jinaṃ smarāmi
nityaṃ ca nityaṃ praṇidhiṃ karomi  saṃbuddhapūjyasya ca darśanārtham || 7 ||
